item.title: [ncc] Sylvan Offering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose an opponent. You and that player each create an X/X green Treefolk creature token.

Choose an opponent. You and that player each create X 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens.

item.title: [ncc] Steelbane Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Turtle Hydra

Steelbane Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Steelbane Hydra: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [ncc] Slippery Bogbonder
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Flash

Hexproof

When Slippery Bogbonder enters the battlefield, put a hexproof counter on target creature. Then move any number of counters from among creatures you control onto that creature.

item.title: [ncc] Thunderfoot Baloth
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, Thunderfoot Baloth gets +2/+2 and other creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample.

item.title: [ncc] Treeshaker Chimera
item.description:
Creature — Chimera

All creatures able to block Treeshaker Chimera do so.

When Treeshaker Chimera dies, draw three cards.

item.title: [ncc] World Shaper
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Shaman

Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may mill three cards.

When World Shaper dies, return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [ncc] Woodfall Primus
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Trample

When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent.

Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

item.title: [ncc] Wood Elves
item.description:
Creature — Elf Scout

When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [ncc] Wickerbough Elder
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [ncc] Wall of Roots
item.description:
Creature — Plant Wall

Defender

Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [ncc] The Beamtown Bullies
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Devil Warrior

Vigilance, haste

{T}: Target opponent whose turn it is puts target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under their control. It gains haste. Goad it. At the beginning of the next end step, exile it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [ncc] Phabine, Boss's Confidant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Advisor

Creature tokens you control have haste.

Parley — At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each land card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Then creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each nonland card revealed thsi way. Then each player draws a card.

item.title: [ncc] Tivit, Seller of Secrets
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Sphinx Rogue

Flying, ward {3}

Council's dilemma — Whenever Tivit enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, starting with you, each player votes for evidence or bribery. For each evidence vote, investigate. For each bribery vote, create a Treasure token.

While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)

item.title: [ncc] Bess, Soul Nourisher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Citizen

Whenever one or more other creatures with base power and toughness 1/1 enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Bess, Soul Nourisher.

Whenever Bess attacks, each other creature you control with power and toughness 1/1 gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Bess.

item.title: [ncc] Agent's Toolkit
item.description:
Artifact — Clue

Agent's Toolkit enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter, a flying counter, a deathtouch counter, and a shield counter on it.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may move a counter from Agent's Toolkit onto that creature.

{2}, Sacrifice Agent's Toolkit: Draw a card.

item.title: [ncc] Brokers Confluence
item.description:
Instant

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

• Target creature phases out.

• Counter target activated or triggered ability.

item.title: [ncc] Cabaretti Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

• Exile target artifact or enchantment.

• Creatures target player controls gets +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [ncc] Grime Gorger
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Menace

Whenever Grime Gorger attacks, exile up to one card of each card type from defending player's graveyard. Put a +1/+1 on Grime Gorger for each card exiled this way.

item.title: [ncc] Denry Klin, Editor in Chief
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cat Advisor

Denry Klin, Editor in Chief enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1, first strike, or vigilance counter on it.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters the battlefield, if Denry has counters put the same number and kind of counters on that creature.

item.title: [ncc] Jolene, the Plunder Queen
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever a player attacks one or more of your opponents, that attacking player creates a Treasure token.

If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.

Sacrifice five Treasures: Put five +1/+1 counters on Jolene.

item.title: [ncc] Life Insurance
item.description:
Enchantment

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token.

item.title: [ncc] Obscura Confluence
item.description:
Instant

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

• Target creature connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

• Target player returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand.

item.title: [ncc] Oskar, Rubbish Reclaimer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each different mana value among cards in your graveyard.

Whenever you discard a nonland card you may cast it from your graveyard.

item.title: [ncc] Prosperous Partnership
item.description:
Enchantment

When Prosperous Partnership enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

Tap three untapped creatures you control: Create a Treasure token.

item.title: [ncc] Riveteers Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Riveteers Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.

• You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [ncc] Vazi, Keen Negotiator
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

Haste

{T}: Target opponent creates X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of Treasure tokens you created this turn.

Whenever an opponent casts a spell or activates an ability, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast or activate it, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then draw a card.

item.title: [ncc] The Beamtown Bullies
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Devil Warrior

Vigilance, haste

{T}: Target opponent whose turn it is puts target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under their control. It gains haste. Goad it. At the beginning of the next end step, exile it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [ncc] Perrie, the Pulverizer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rhino Soldier

When Perrie enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

Whenever Perrie attacks, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of different kinds of counters among permanents you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/streets-of-new-capenna-commander

item.title: [ncc] Parnesse, the Subtle Brush
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Wizard

Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless that player pays 4 life.

Whenever you copy a spell, up to one target opponent may also copy that spell. They may choose new targets for that copy.

https://www.wargamer.com/magic-the-gathering/streets-of-new-capenna-commander-deck-maestros-massacre-reveal

item.title: [ncc] Tivit, Seller of Secrets
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Sphinx Rogue

Flying, ward {3}

Council's dilemma — Whenever Tivit enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, starting with you, each player votes for evidence or bribery. For each evidence vote, investigate. For each bribery vote, create a Treasure token.

While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)

item.title: [ncc] Bess, Soul Nourisher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Citizen

Whenever one or more other creatures with base power and toughness 1/1 enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Bess, Soul Nourisher.

Whenever Bess attacks, each other creature you control with power and toughness 1/1 gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Bess.

item.title: [ncc] Cryptic Pursuit
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Whenever a face-down creature you control dies, exile it if it's an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card until the end of your next turn.

https://www.wargamer.com/magic-the-gathering/streets-of-new-capenna-commander-deck-maestros-massacre-reveal

item.title: [ncc] Cabaretti Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

• Exile target artifact or enchantment.

• Creatures target player controls gets +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [ncc] Maestros Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Return target monocolored instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

• Goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

https://www.wargamer.com/magic-the-gathering/streets-of-new-capenna-commander-deck-maestros-massacre-reveal

item.title: [ncc] Life Insurance
item.description:
Enchantment

Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you lose 1 life and create a Treasure token.

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever a player attacks one or more of your opponents, that attacking player creates a Treasure token.

If you would create one or more Treasure tokens, instead create those tokens plus an additional Treasure token.

Sacrifice five Treasures: Put five +1/+1 counters on Jolene.

item.title: [ncc] Grime Gorger
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Menace

Whenever Grime Gorger attacks, exile up to one card of each card type from defending player's graveyard. Put a +1/+1 on Grime Gorger for each card exiled this way.

item.title: [ncc] Prosperous Partnership
item.description:
Enchantment

When Prosperous Partnership enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

Tap three untapped creatures you control: Create a Treasure token.

item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each different mana value among cards in your graveyard.

Whenever you discard a nonland card you may cast it from your graveyard.

item.description:
Instant

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

• Target creature connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

• Target player returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand.

item.title: [ncc] Syrix, Carrier of the Flame
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phoenix

Flying, haste

At the beginning of each end step, if a creature card left your graveyard this turn, target Phoenix you control deals damage equal to its power to any target.

Whenever another Phoenix you control dies, you may cast Syrix, Carrier of the Flame from your graveyard.

https://www.wargamer.com/magic-the-gathering/streets-of-new-capenna-commander-deck-maestros-massacre-reveal

item.title: [ncc] Riveteers Confluence
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.

• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

• Riveteers Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control.

• You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [ncc] Aura Mutation
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target enchantment. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that enchantment's mana value.

item.title: [ncc] Assemble the Legion
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

item.title: [ncc] Artifact Mutation
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that artifact's mana value.

item.title: [ncc] Alela, Artful Provocateur
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Faerie Warlock

Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.

Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token with flying.

item.title: [ncc] Ajani Unyielding
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ajani

+2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all nonland permanent cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

−2: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

−9: Put five +1/+1 counters on each creature you control and five loyalty counters on each other planeswalker you control.

item.title: [ncc] Bant Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library.

• Counter target instant spell.

item.title: [ncc] Aven Mimeomancer
item.description:
Creature — Bird Wizard

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a feather counter on target creature. If you do, that creature has base power and toughness 3/1 and has flying for as long as it has a feather counter on it.

item.title: [ncc] Camaraderie
item.description:
Sorcery

You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
